dmca.title: US Registered Trademark Infringement
dmca.body:
Dear Sir or Madam, 

It has come to my attention that a domain -  pillsvalue.net  - that is hosted by The Planet on the IP - 70.84.95.226 -  contains elements that are direct infringements of  our US Registered Trademark. 

Namely this page  - 

http://pillsvalue.net/doors/parazzit/1909go/dangerdave-290.html

 - that contains the text/HTML elements...


<meta name="keywords" Content="dangerdave, dangerdave links, au dangerdave, au dangerdave uk, dangerdave porn">

and 


<meta name="description" Content="dangerdave information. all about dangerdave. dangerdave sites list">

and other elements within the page.


I am the registered proprietor in the United States of the trademark: Dangerdave. (Serial Number 75637813)

As you are aware, I have for many years provided legal adult material on the internet. As a result of my activities, the Dangerdave trademark has become extremely well known in the adult website space.


Your customer
